text: Eucharis astrophiala is a species of plant which is endemic to Ecuador.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Eucharis astrophiala Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests and subtropical or tropical moist montane forests.Ravenna, Pedro Felix. 1985. Phytologia 57: 95–96. Eucharis astrophiala Ravenna, Pedro Felix. 1982. Plant Life 38: 49. Urceolina astrophiala It is endangered by habitat loss.IUCN Red List of Threatened Species, 2013, Eucharis astrophiala ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador astrophiala Category:Endangered plants Category:Plants described in 1985 Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Eucharis astrophiala
